articles.title: Samuel L. Jackson didn't ask for 'Pulp Fiction' lightsaber in 'Star Wars' - Insider
articles.description: Jackson told Jimmy Fallon that the crew put a reference to his iconic wallet from the Quentin Tarantino movie on the button of the prop.
articles.content:
Samuel L. Jackson said on "The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon" that a "Pulp Fiction" reference was engraved on his "Star Wars" lightsaber as a gift.

articles.title: Cameron Diaz, still stunning, says she doesn't care what she looks like anymore - CNN
